name: DC 225/DC 290 - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Designed by Vincenzo de Cotiis in 2009, the DC 225/290 sofa refers to the two different sizes in which it is offered. Part of the same line as the DC 90 armchair, it shares the same design philosophy and style. With its strong architectural presence, it populates the living room, creating a true island of comfort. The structure, made of solid American walnut, has a slightly curved X shape, elegantly enveloping the deep seats with a backrest featuring two or four/five cushions.
